Package bbc.rd.tvanytime.xml

Provides classes for creating in-memory TVA tables from an XML data source.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
XMLParser XMLParser: Interface for TVAnytime XML parsers.
 

Class Summary
SAXServiceInformationHandler SAXServiceInformationHandler: SAX event handler used by SAXXMLParser to parse ServiceInformationTable.
SAXXMLParser SAXXMLParser: Implementation of XMLParser Interface using SAX.
 

Exception Summary
NonFatalXMLException NonFatalXMLException: An exception to be thrown by implementations of XMLParser when XML is valid but invalid TVAnytime data values are found.
 

Package bbc.rd.tvanytime.xml Description

Provides classes for creating in-memory TVA tables from an XML data source.
